original_title: Top Secret Rosies: The Female 'Computers' of WWII
overview: In 1942, when computers were human and women were underestimated, a group of female mathematicians helped win a war and usher in the modern computer age. Sixty-five years later their story has finally been told.
tagline: In war, math may be the most secret weapon of all.
title: Top Secret Rosies: The Female 'Computers' of WWII
